body_html: It's not really clear what you are asking. However, it looks somewhat like sparse ragged arrays. You might look at our sparse tensor format. Also, this question is more of a TensorFlow usage question, so please re-ask in StackOverflow. GitHub issues is primarily for bugs, feature requests, etc. If you find that nobody's suggestions on StackOverflow are reasonable, then you can come back and request a specific feature.
